basics.name: Minseong Cho
basics.summary: Currently a graduate researcher at Ajou University. My research interests include active matter dynamics, the Leidenfrost effect, and hair dynamics.

topics: Boundary-driven active matter in soft hydrogels
Boundary-driven active matter in soft hydrogels

presentations.name: Leidenfrost-induced active matter dynamics of spherical hydrogels
presentations.event: APS Division of Fluid Dynamics Meeting 2025

presentations.name: Leidenfrost-induced active matter dynamics of spherical hydrogels
